name: Oblivio (Team Harpy)
description:
Oblivio is a platform game with puzzles, a non-linear engaging narrative, based on a cyberpunk universe.

Your mission is to help three patients, traveling inside their minds, and finding out the root to their psychological problems. Through your journey new abilities are unlocked, helping you explore their memories even more.

.

We are game design students from Brazil and this project started as a semester assignment. We would love to hear your feedback in the comments <3

.

Known bugs:

- Sometimes when you run into a corner, the character might get stuck into the jump animation. Try to press R to reset that area and try again.

- The electric wall might not be deactivated under a light in a few rare cases, making the game unplayable. We apologize and please let us know.
